movies.title: The Underground Banker
movies.originalTitle: Xiang Gang qi an: Xi xue gui li wang
movies.plot: A man's family is torn apart when his wife takes a loan from a loan shark who will stop at nothing to get his money back.
movies.simplePlot: A man's family is torn apart when his wife takes a loan from a loan shark who will stop at nothing to get his money back.

biography.bio: Radium Cheung was born on August 4, 1976 in Canton, China. He is known for his work on Tangerine (2015), Starlet (2012) and Billions (2016).
biography.name: Radium Cheung

biography.bio: Wai-Lim Chu is known for his work on The Defender (1994), Made in Hong Kong (1997) and Daai foo ji ga (1994).
biography.name: Wai-Lim Chu

biography.placeOfBirth: Kowloon City, Hong Kong, British Crown Colony
biography.bio: Ka-Kui Ho was born on March 14, 1951 in Kowloon City, Hong Kong, British Crown Colony. He is known for his work on Riki-Oh: The Story of Ricky (1991), Prison on Fire (1987) and La secte du lotus blanc (1992). He died on January 27, 2015 in Hong Kong.
biography.name: Ka-Kui Ho

biography.bio: Elizabeth Lee was born on August 31, 1963 in Hong Kong as Lee Mei-Fung. She is an actress, known for Female Reporter (1989), Jing hun ji (1989) and Choi saan gong woo (1990). She has been married to Hsiang-Chung Cheng since 1996. They have two children. She was previously married to Man-Chung Lam.
biography.name: Elizabeth Lee

biography.bio: Lawrence Ng was born in Hong Kong, China. He is known for his work on Sex and Zen (1991), L'auberge du dragon (1992) and Center Stage (1991).
biography.name: Lawrence Ng

biography.bio: Bo-ming Shin is known for his work on The Return of the God of Gamblers (1994), Curry & Pepper (1990) and Zei sheng (1991).
biography.name: Bo-ming Shin

biography.birthName: Anthony Perry (English name) Chau-Sang Wong (Chinese Name)
biography.bio: Anthony Wong Chau-Sang was born to a British father and a Chinese mother. He never knew his father, since the man left his family when Wong was four years old. He trained acting at ATV and later enrolled into the Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts. After working in several TV Series, he shot to stardom with hits such as "Hard-Boiled" and his Golden Horse-winning performance in the horrific "The Untold Story." He later appeared in the "Young and Dangerous" films as Dai Fei, a friend to Ekin Cheng's Ho Nam. In 1995, he made his directorial debut with New Tenant. He won his second Hong Kong Film Award for his role as the corrupt police officer Tung in the critically acclaimed "Beast Cops" (1998). Wong continued his success in supporting roles in films such as "Infernal Affairs" (2002) and "Initial D" (2005).
biography.name: Anthony Chau-Sang Wong

biography.bio: Chi Yeung Wong was born on August 1, 1967. He is an actor, known for Once Upon a Time in China (1991), Si wang jian yu (1994) and Du xia 1999 (1998).
biography.name: Chi Yeung Wong
